title: Causal Discovery with Stage Variables for Health Time Series. (arXiv:2305.03662v1 [cs.AI])
abstract: Using observational data to learn causal relationships is essential when randomized experiments are not possible, such as in healthcare. Discovering causal relationships in time-series health data is even more challenging when relationships change over the course of a disease, such as medications that are most effective early on or for individuals with severe disease. Stage variables such as weeks of pregnancy, disease stages, or biomarkers like HbA1c, can influence what causal relationships are true for a patient. However, causal inference within each stage is often not possible due to limited amounts of data, and combining all data risks incorrect or missed inferences. To address this, we propose Causal Discovery with Stage Variables (CDSV), which uses stage variables to reweight data from multiple time-series while accounting for different causal relationships in each stage. translated_title: 应用阶段变量进行健康时间序列的因果发现
translated_abstract: 当随机试验不可行时，使用观察数据学习因果关系是至关重要的，例如在医疗保健领域。发现时间序列健康数据中的因果关系更具挑战性，因为这些关系随着疾病的进展而发生变化，例如最有效的药物早期或严重患病者。阶段变量（如妊娠周数、疾病阶段或HbA1c等生物标志物）可以影响在患者身上成立的因果关系。本文提出了一种名为“使用阶段变量的因果发现”（CDSV）的方法，它使用阶段变量重新加权多个时间序列的数据，同时考虑每个阶段中的不同因果关系。仿真数据表明，与基线相比，CDSV可以使用更少的假发现发现更多的原因，在eICU中进行的实验获得了更好的结果。
tldr: 本文提出了使用阶段变量进行因果发现的CDSV方法，可以在考虑每个阶段的不同因果关系的同时，利用多个时间序列的数据重新加权，从而发现更多的原因并减少假发现。
